description: view of a restaurant with arches and chandeliers and people sitting on chairs at multiple tables scattered throughout the room; in the foreground on the lower left is a man in profile reading a paper laid out along with two coffee cups on the table in front of him; figures at the tables in the background are less defined and become smaller as they recede in the distance
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: W. Gramatté E.112-II. | LRC of sheet, in pencil: 17 | LL of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2224
signed: LLC of sheet, in pencil: Café
title: Café
